General.Name: Xinjiang Torch Gas Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Torch Gas Co., Ltd operates as a gas service company in China. It engages in urban gas supply; operation and management of refueling stations; production and supply of heat; and installation of gas facilities and equipment, as well as provision of taxi passenger service. It owns 2 CNG master stations and CNG refueling, as well as pipeline network. Xinjiang Torch Gas Co., Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Kashi, China.
General.Address: No. 77, Century Avenue South Road, Kashi, China, 844000
